resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Several animals are represented on this drawing, which wasn't the case in the other pictures where the background was fully white.
resource.chars: Several animals are represented on this drawing, which wasn't the case in the other pictures where the background was fully white.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1204.9,455.23636c0,-7.09091 3.54545,-14.18182 10.63636,-21.27273c0,-5.8743 -4.76206,-10.63636 -10.63636,-10.63636c-5.8743,0 -10.63636,4.76206 -10.63636,10.63636c7.09091,7.09091 10.63636,14.18182 10.63636,21.27273z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"fixedSize":true,"editable":true,"deleteIcon":null,"annotation":null}" id="pin_a82a27c7-7c22-4226-86af-c75ccf95c4d5" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
The presence of nature awakening after the snowstorm. 
This is a free interpretation of what could happend after the myth. (Yuki-Onna abandonned her husband and children after her husband broke a promise). The author created a happy ending and represented a locus amoenus.
resource.chars:
The presence of nature awakening after the snowstorm. 

This is a free interpretation of what could happend after the myth. (Yuki-Onna abandonned her husband and children after her husband broke a promise). The author created a happy ending and represented a locus amoenus.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: There is no more snow hiding her, but steam and water still covering her feet to indicate that she is not human.
resource.chars: There is no more snow hiding her, but steam and water still covering her feet to indicate that she is not human.
